ARABIC: أُبَلِّغُكُمْ رِسَٰلَٰتِ رَبِّى وَأَنصَحُ لَكُمْ وَأَعْلَمُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِ مَا لَا تَعْلَمُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: transmitting my Lord's Message to you and giving you good counsel, and I know from Allah what you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I bring to you the messages of my Lord, and give you sincere advice, for I know from God what you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I convey to you the messages of my Lord, give you sincere advice, and I know from Allah that which you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: sent to preach to you the message of my Lord and to give you good advice. I know what you do not know about God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Conveying to you the messages of my Lord and wishing good for you, and I know from Allah what you do not know.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: I convey unto you the Messages of my Lord and give sincere advice to you. And I know from Allah what you know not."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: I deliver to you the messages of my Lord, and I offer you good advice and I know from Allah what you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: I deliver to you the Messages of my Lord, and I advise you sincerely; for I know from God that you know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: I convey unto you the messages of my Lord and give good counsel unto you, and know from Allah that which ye know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: I am conveying my Lord's messages to you and giving you sincere advice. I know things from God that you do not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: I preach unto you the messages of my Lord and I councel you good, and I know from Allah which ye know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: I communicate to you the messages of my Lord, and I am your well-wisher, and I know from Allah what you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: I but fulfil towards you the duties of my Lord's mission: Sincere is my advice to you, and I know from Allah something that ye know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: I convey unto you the Messages of my Lord and give sincere advice to you. And I know from Allah what you know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: (sent) to convey to you the messages of my Lord and to advise you, for I know from Allah what you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: “I deliver to you the messages of my Lord, and I advise you, and I know from God what you do not know.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: I convey to you the messages of my Lord and advise you; and I know from Allah what you do not know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [7:62] I convey to you (read ublighkum or uballighukum) the Messages of my Lord, and I am advising you, I desire good [for you], for I know from God what you know not.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (I convey unto you the messages of my Lord) by explaining commands and prohibition (and give good counsel unto you) I warn against the torment and call you to repentance and faith, (and know from Allah that which ye know not) of torment, if you do not believe.
